clinical_history: Follow-up ultrasound for known liver lesion.
technique: Color Doppler and spectral analysis performed where necessary.
findings: Breast tissue shows well-defined lesion measuring 15.77 mm.
No evidence of DVT; veins compressible with normal flow.
Major vessels show smooth-walled waveform on Doppler.
Right kidney demonstrates isoechoic, no hydronephrosis.
Common bile duct measures 18.14 mm, within normal limits.
